name: Skull Check
description:
Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • J - Fireball
  • K - Heal
  • Space - Skip Turn

Help your Skull jump and fight their way through the dungeon as they re-invent themselves with new stat rolls each turn. 

Higher Dex gives more movement, and higher Str and Int give better success rates and damage on attacks and spells. Use your strengths to your advantage and pray to the gods of random numbers to defeat them all!
